## Grading Rubric

| Criterion | Points | Excellent | Good | Needs Work |
|-----------|--------|-----------|------|------------|
| Functionality | 40 | All requirements met | Most requirements | Some requirements |
| Code Quality | 25 | Clean, documented | Mostly clean | Needs cleanup |
| Best Practices | 20 | Follows all patterns | Follows most | Inconsistent |
| Completeness | 15 | All parts complete | Missing minor | Missing major |

**Total: {{LAB_POINTS}} points**
